text.section: Any clerk who is delinquent in making the inventory required in subsection (4) of KRS 172.110 shall be fined five dollars ($5) for each month or part of month he is delinquent.
Any person who violates subsection (2) of KRS 172.140 shall, in addition to his civil liability, be fined not exceeding fifty dollars ($50).

Any clerk who knowingly permits any book of the laws of this state or reports of the Court of Justice to be taken from his office in such a manner that he cannot produce the book when called upon to do so, shall be fined not exceeding fifty dollars ($50).

law.history: Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 62, sec. 92. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 2430, 2431, 2438c-8.
